meanings.definition: To assign a new number to something.
meanings.sent1: She renumbers the pages in her notebook after tearing some out.
meanings.sent2: The librarian renumbers the books on the shelf to keep them organized.
meanings.sent3: The teacher renumbers the students for a fun seating arrangement.
meanings.sent4: The artist renumbers the colors in his palette to create a new painting.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic renumbers the parts of the engine to ensure proper assembly.

meanings.definition: To reorder a list of numbers.
meanings.sent1: He renumbers the list of phone numbers in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent2: The accountant renumbers the expenses from highest to lowest.
meanings.sent3: The chef renumbers the recipe steps for a unique cooking challenge.
meanings.sent4: The student renumbers the test questions for a different perspective.
meanings.sent5: The gardener renumbers the plant labels for a clearer layout.

meanings.definition: To change the numbering of something.
meanings.sent1: The editor renumbers the pages of the manuscript for publication.
meanings.sent2: The architect renumbers the floors of the building for better navigation.
meanings.sent3: The conductor renumbers the musical scores for a surprising performance.
meanings.sent4: The designer renumbers the clothing sizes for a more inclusive range.
meanings.sent5: The historian renumbers the events in the timeline for accuracy.
